title: kalai vizhiyAlE kaNDEnE
sahitya:
kalai vizhiyAlE kaNDEnE kaDavuLaik-kAlaiyum mAlaiyum kani naghai purivadaik-


anupallavi

  malai nadi asaivilE alai kaDal isaiyilE mazhai mukhil garjikka viLaiyADum minnilE


caraNam    tEn malar naghaiyilE tIn-kani shuvaiyilE sEigaLaik-konjiDum tAi mukhat-tiruvilE
vAn shuDaroLiyilE kAn pashu vanappilE vaLam perum iyarkkaiyin uLam perum oLiyilE
